metadata.name: Never-Ending Rum Punch
metadata.description:
Radames "Juni" Figueroa X Juan "JUFE" Fern√°ndez

Never Ending Tropical Fountains is a series of ephemeral sculptures that the artist Radames Juni Figueroa places in his openings and invites spectators to celebration and leisure. Each fountain is created with a tower of fruit, a water pump, natural juices and alcohol. On this occasion Juni and Jufe have come together to collaborate and create a collection of digital sources based on the originals and through the digital medium to seek to immortalize something ephemeral.

2007-2021
